title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, August 2, 2020
description: It's the 78th birthday of Isabel Allende (1942), who once got fired for translating romance novels too liberally, adding depth and independence to the women characters.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the 78th birthday of Isabel Allende (1942), who once got fired for translating romance novels too liberally, adding depth and independence to the women characters.
